limit = int(raw_input())
for i in xrange(limit):
	nails = int(raw_input())
	mid = "".join(raw_input().split(" "))
	mid = mid.strip()
	price = None
	for j in reversed(xrange(1,10)):
		for k in reversed(xrange(0,10)):
			number = int(str(j) + mid + str(k))
			if number % nails == 0:
				price = number / nails
				break
		if price != None:
			print j,k,price
			break
	else:
		print 0
